name: Pew Pew - The Space War
description:
A space shooter where everyone is on their own. Made for the 246th One Hour Gamejam.

Shoot lasers and destroy enemies to gain as many points as you can!

CONTROLS:

W, A, S, D - move forward/backward and rotate to the left/right

Left Click - shoot primary lasers

Right Click - shoot secondary lasers

R - restart level

Mouse - aim for shooting the secondary lasers
